page.title: 05Chairman of the Governors.
page.content: Councillor R.O.Bennet, is Chairman of the governors at Stratton School. He has been a chairman for three to four years and has been a governor for six years. He has the authority to make decisions for the governors without their knowledge and is involved in all of the major staff appointments at the school. He is also involved in negotiations with the Chief Education Officer. There are parent, pupil and staff governors as well as those elected from the council. The headmaster has an ex-officio seat.
